column102: Technical evaluation of all the five bidders was carried out by the sub-committee and it was found that M/s HC Bansal cont. and Eng. has not executed building works valuing at least Rs. 150 Lac in any one year out of last three years Hence rejected.
column107: The Committee recommended that M/s Vidya Infrastructure and developers has quoted the lowest amount and is declared as L-1 bidder, who has already been prequalified in the techno-commercial bid.
